original_text: But Omri did many things that the Lord said were evil. He did more evil things than all the kings of Israel who lived before him.
korean_text: 오므리가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 그 전의 모든 사람보다 더욱 악하게 행하여

sentences.original_text: that the Lord said were evil

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 더 많은 악한 일들을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: than all the kings of Israel
